title: Om Puri Was Honoured At The Oscars – Here’s What His Family Has To Say
text:
Rashmi Daryanani Feb . 27 . 2017 Om Puri 
As part of the 89th Academy Awards, those in the industry who have passed away were acknowledged in a special segment. Jennifer Aniston introduced it, while Sara Bareilles performed a musical tribute. 
Om Puri , who has worked in several Hollywood films, was one of those honoured in the montage. Other legends like Carrie Fisher, Prince, Bill Nunn, Curtis Hanson and more were also remembered. 
His family has now released a statement, expressing their gratitude: 
The only Indian actor to have worked consistently in Hollywood and British cinema for the last 25 years, without a fuss and letting his work speak for itself, today the Academy of Motion Pictures acknowledged his contribution at its 89th Awards. The first and only Indian actor to be acknowledged thus. Thank you Academy. Thank you everyone. We miss you Om. We miss you lots. Ishaan and Nandita Puri. 
A great gesture indeed.
